channel.title: Player Rights
channel.description: Ok wassup guys? I was wondering if someone was kind enough to give me a step by step tutorial on how to add player rights to my 525 rsps. Im using TrisidiaX as source and client and cache :p

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

ok ill get back to you as soon as i get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Well sorry to break it to you but I don’t have any RSPS files anymore. I’m helping you from memory.

And that code won’t help. Just keep searching for variables from the character files.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

can you give me an example of what it looks like?
i found this tho…

boxHeight += textDrawingArea_2.baseCharacterHeight + 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Just go to client.java (or whatever your main file is) and search for character height. Keep going until you find a bunch of ints and some text that looks like a character’s file.

Read full topic

character-height = 0

height

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Just do a search for something like character-height and you’ll find a bunch of declarations of integers.

Paste that here and I’ll put a Donor integer for you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:

Usman do you think that u can do one for me? so the player info i pasted can u do it on that and show me?

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:37, topic:467187”]You copy and paste the integer declaration into all of the chracters’ files.

When they donate, change it to 2[/quote]

This is the lazy way of manually doing it. People usually do this when they can’t figure out how to create a Command to do this for them.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

No no, you use the 2 for the new integer you make. My example was “characterDonor”. Admin is for “characterRights”

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:

but 2 is already admin?

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555

@usman555 wrote:

You copy and paste the integer declaration into all of the chracters’ files.

When they donate, change it to 2

put it in your compiler

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Ok 4 is already a donator rank…I want to add a super donator and i will add commands for them…?
See what im saying? And where do i put that thing manually?

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:33, topic:467187”]Ahh now I know what you’re saying.

Imagine this:

0 = Member
1= Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

Now 4 will make a person a donor, but they won’t have the member rights or other position rights. They will only be a donor.

Just add another little line to the code where that template is generated saying

You won’t have to put this on your players that already play. Once they donate, you can manually put that line for them.

Now simply make the characters have their donor rights become 2 when they donate. You can do this manually or come up with a way of doing it automatically. Then you can use if statements like:

if (characterDonor == 2){ //If your characterDonor int is 2 addItem(995, 1000); //Give 1000gp }else{ //If your characterDonor int is anything BUT 2 sM("You are not a donor!"); //Say this }[/quote]

You might want to have the new Right save to their Character File as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Ahh now I know what you’re saying.

Imagine this:

0 = Member
1= Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

Now 4 will make a person a donor, but they won’t have the member rights or other position rights. They will only be a donor.

Just add another little line to the code where that template is generated saying

You won’t have to put this on your players that already play. Once they donate, you can manually put that line for them.

Now simply make the characters have their donor rights become 2 when they donate. You can do this manually or come up with a way of doing it automatically. Then you can use if statements like:

if (characterDonor == 2){ //If your characterDonor int is 2 addItem(995, 1000); //Give 1000gp }else{ //If your characterDonor int is anything BUT 2 sM("You are not a donor!"); //Say this }

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Host Gushers:

Pvp i know how to do that. I want to add a new Right. I wanna add super donator. I have donator but not super donator and i want to add that.

You can just use the other Rights as a base for a new one.

Read full topic
